footer.description: The Jan IngenHousz Institute specializes in the development of advanced technologies for improving photosynthesis and agricultural efficiency. We use cutting-edge techniques and algorithms to create intelligent systems that can help researchers automate tasks, improve efficiency, and drive innovation.

jii.aboutDescription: The world's population is growing, while the area of suitable agricultural land is shrinking and harvests are declining due to climate change. A breakthrough is urgently needed. To this end, JII-researchers are working to understand and improve the green engine of agriculture: photosynthesis.
jii.missionDescription: Improving photosynthesis is a big challenge: different processes in the plant limit photosynthesis under different conditions, and each of these processes is regulated by different sets of genes. The Jan IngenHousz Institute was founded specifically to meet these major challenges.
jii.heroSubtitle: Non-profit. Open-source. Empowering global collaboration in plant science and photosynthesis research.
jii.missionShort: Our mission: Accelerate discovery, foster open collaboration, and make scientific data accessible for all.
jii.featureExperimentManagementDesc: Organize, share, and collaborate on experiments with global teams in real time.
jii.featureDeviceOnboardingDesc: Seamlessly connect and manage scientific devices for automated data collection.
jii.featureOpenCollabDesc: Work openly or set custom embargo periods for sensitive data before public release.
jii.featureCustomAccessDesc: Control who can view, edit, or contribute to your projects and datasets.
jii.partnersDesc: Join a growing network of leading institutions advancing science together.
jii.keyFeaturesDesc: Everything you need to manage experiments, collaborate globally, and accelerate discovery.
jii.footerBrandDesc: Accelerating scientific discovery through open collaboration and innovative research tools.

about.title: About OpenJII
about.description: OpenJII is dedicated to advancing open science and fostering global collaboration through innovative research platforms. We believe in democratizing access to scientific knowledge and breaking down barriers between researchers, institutions, and communities worldwide.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Find answers to common questions about OpenJII and how to get started.
faq.answer1: OpenJII is a non-profit, open-source platform for collaborative plant science and photosynthesis research.
faq.question2: How can I join the platform?
faq.answer2: You can sign up for an account or request an invitation from an existing member.
faq.answer3: You control the visibility of your projects and data. You can keep them private, share with collaborators, or make them public.
faq.answer4: OpenJII supports multiple languages. You can change your preferred language in your account settings.
